mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_diary SET user_id = #{loginedUserId}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}
mapper.select: SELECT A.diary_id AS diaryId, B.nickname, A.title, A.contents, A.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_diary A JOIN t_user B USING (user_id) WHERE user_id = #{loginedUserId} AND is_del = 0 ORDER BY diary_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT diary_id AS diaryId, pic FROM t_diary_pic WHERE diary_id
#{diaryId}
mapper.delete: DELETE B FROM t_diary A LEFT JOIN t_diary_pic B ON A.diary_id = B.diary_id WHERE A.diary_id = #{diaryId} AND A.user_id = #{loginedUserId}
